content: popinjay is a quite simple hat with stranded pattern the color combinations are endless so have fun **gauge ** 22 sts in 10 cm/4 in stranded pattern **needles** - 3 00 mm/us #2 ½ for rib - 4 00 mm/us #6 **yarn ** garnstudio drops karisma 100 m/109 yards per 50 g - about 40 g of colour 17 navy blue main colour m - about 30 g of colour 18 red contrast colour 1 c1 - about 30 g of colour 01 off white contrast colour 2 c2 - extra yarn for pompom this is the first pattern i have ever written so if you find any mistakes or inconsistencies your feedback will be very valuable thank you
